content: Please note that this Football Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of hilarious' Premier League pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405399.0Southampton + Arsenal + São Paulo FC Thursday + SaturdayFootball Prediction Contest!Game 1:  Arsenal v FK Bodø/Glimthttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/international-clubs/uefa-europa-league/arsenal-fc-v-bodo-glimt-632718aa079de577b199ba44Game 2:  São Paulo FC v América Futebol Clube MGhttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/brazil/brasileiro-serie-a/america-fc-mg-v-sao-paulo-fc-sp-6336e1e1f30fb913d8120b1aGame 3:  Southampton v Man Cityhttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/manchester-city-v-southampton-fc-631eca722ff46a6723f4db03Rulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  15'  2-0  ArsenalGame 2:  15'  2-0  São Paulo FCGame 3:  15'  2-0  Southampton PrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free Bet!If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mbtc!(Small print) *The declared winners are final and up to my discretion*
